publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1290 Mr Brian Monteith: English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final-That the Parliament congratulates Craigmount High School, Dunblane High School, Kirkcudbright Academy and Webster's High School for reaching the English-Speaking Union Juniors Debating Final from the 88 entering teams; believes that there are many skills to be gained from encouraging debating in schools, including written and oral communication, deduction, reasoning, self-discipline and humility; considers the high level of participation as very encouraging for the future of school debating in Scotland, and wishes all teams to have a lively, enjoyable and informative final debate on the motion, "This House would withdraw British troops from Iraq immediately" at Glasgow University Union on 22 May 2004.
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) John Swinburne*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Alex Fergusson*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*, Carolyn Leckie*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, John Scott*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Rhona Brankin*, Christine Grahame*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Shiona Baird*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Mr David Davidson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-1290 English-Speaking Union, Juniors Debating Final (lodged on 7 May 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
